text:
I'm using the xhtml:abbr tag to certain terms that are abbreviations.  This is
necessary to meet W3C accessiblity recommendations.  Unfortunately, the lenya
i18n pipelines remove these tags.
creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com

text:
Hi JeanPierre,

can you please give a detailed example which lets me reproduce this? Are the
tags completely removed?

Thanks.
creator: roku@apache.org

text:
I guess you mean if you enter <abbr> in <message> in a i18n message catalogue.
This is IMHO a Cocoon i18n transformer limitation. Setting this to WONTIX.
